payload.title: IMethodology Interface - Types and Contracts
payload.description: Implement IMethodology interface with complete type definitions for configurable workflow validation. Define ValidationContext, TransitionRule, SignatureRule, TaskStatus, Trigger types and MethodologyConfig structure for JSON-based methodology configuration.
payload.notes: IMethodology interface designed as canonical contract for any methodology engine. Types support configurable workflow rules, guild-based validation, custom rules engine and signature validation. Foundation for decoupling workflow logic from core business logic.
